statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data;
SELECT drug_name, patient_age FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, patient_age FROM clinical_trial_data ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_gender FROM clinical_trial_data;
SELECT trial_date, drug_name FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY trial_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, patient_age FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_age ASC
SELECT trial_id, drug_name, patient_gender FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 AND drug_name LIKE 'Aspirin%'
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trial_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT trial_id, patient_id, trial_date, patient_age FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY trial_date ASC
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT trial_id, drug_name FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, trial_result, trial_date FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_result = 'Positive';
SELECT drug_name, trial_date FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE drug_name LIKE '%cin%' ORDER BY trial_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_result = 'successful';
SELECT trial_id, drug_name, patient_id FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trial_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS trial_count FROM clinical_trial_data GROUP BY drug_name HAVING trial_count > 3;
SELECT patient_id, trial_result FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND trial_result = 'positive' ORDER BY trial_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(trial_id) AS max_trial_id, MIN(trial_id) AS min_trial_id FROM clinical_trial_data;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, trial_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drugs WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT trial_id, patient_id, trial_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE drug_name='Aspirin';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_id, drug_name, patient_id, trial_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drugs WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY drug_name ASC, manufacturer DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients JOIN clinical_trials ON patients.patient_id = clinical_trials.patient_id WHERE drug_name='Aspirin' ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT drug_name, patient_id, trial_date FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT trial_id, drug_name, patient_id FROM ClinicalTrials ORDER BY trial_id DESC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM Drugs WHERE dosage = '10mg';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM Drugs;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE trial_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT drug_name, dosage, manufacturer FROM Drugs ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, drug_name, efficacy FROM Patients p JOIN TrialResults tr ON p.patient_id = tr.patient_id JOIN Drugs d ON tr.drug_id = d.drug_id;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT drug_name, patient_id, trial_date FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY trial_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drugs WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT trial_id, result FROM trial_results LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT drug_name, trial_date, result FROM clinical_trials WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND trial_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_id, result FROM trial_results JOIN clinical_trials ON trial_results.trial_id = clinical_trials.trial_id WHERE efficacy_rating > 80;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, dosage FROM drugs JOIN drug_manufacturers ON drugs.manufacturer = drug_manufacturers.manufacturer_name WHERE dosage < 5.0;
